text: agra Jabase kumate Giliati kaziga vuno, kora Filistia vahe'mo'za Soline nemofo Jonatanigizani Gilboa agonafi znahete'za, zanavufga eri'za maka vahe'mo'zama atruma nehazafi Jabes-Giliati ome hanti znante'naze. Henka Jabesi vahe'mo'za oku'a vu'za zanavufama ome eri'za asente'nafinti zaferina zani'a omerinaku vu'ne.
